body:
- **Datapod frameworks**
	- *Edward's Language Learning Site*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Vite-React 0.0.0**
			- **Datapod Engine 0.0.0**
	- *Edward's Tech Site*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Nextjs 0.0.0**
	- *Edward's Personal site*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Nuxt 0.0.0**
	- *Datapod Central*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Angular 0.0.0**	
	- *Edward's Fitness Site*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-SvelteKit 0.0.0**
	- *Edward's Learn Vim Site* 
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Python 0.0.0**
	- *Edward's Tech Items Site*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Phoenix 0.0.0**#gif#phoenixdemo
	- *Edward's Job Site*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Go 0.0.0**
		- possible frameworks
			- Echo: https://echo.labstack.com##echopic
	- *Edward's Personal Task Manager*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Electron 0.0.0**
		- offline program that manages personal tasks and projects
		- can publish static sites that show itemTypes
	- *Edward's Good Arguments Site*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Ruby-on-Rails 0.0.0**
	- *(((project)))*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-T3-Stack 0.0.0**
	- *(((project)))*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Haskell 0.0.0**
		- uses the Yesod framework
	- *(((project)))*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Rust 0.0.0**
		- uses the Actix framework
	- *(((project)))*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Clojure 0.0.0**
		- uses the re-frame framework
	- *(((project)))*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-Laravel 0.0.0**
		- uses Vue.js for the frontend
	- *(((project)))*
		- genericizes
			- **Datapod-for-ASP.NET-Core 0.0.0**	
- **supporting tools**
	- 4.9; Docker; get full stack apps hosted at Hetzner with docker-compose
	- 4.8; Zod; get site working with validation/cleansing frontend/backend for all data inputs
	- 4.7; Kinde; get example site working
	- 4.6; socket.io; howto that shows chat, dashboard and instant shows instant clicks on likes
	- 4.1; Clerk; get example site working
	- 3.8; [uploadthing](https://uploadthing.com); howto that allows Next.js site to upload images to Hetzner
	- 3.7; shadcn; howto that shows how to use 20 components
	- 3.6; CSS Layouts; make a library of various mobile-first 
	- 3.4; hosting at [Koyeb](https://www.koyeb.com/pricing) - mentioned for Go
	- 3.4; hosting at [Qovery](https://www.qovery.com/pricing) - mentioned for Go
	- 2.6; GraphQL
